review: This is an Amazon Prime Visa.  It gives 5% cashback on all Amazon purchases if you are a Prime member, 3% if you are not.  But the feature I use the most is the 0% interest  paid over a 6, 12, 18 or 24 month period for expensive purchases.

name: Mitchell
review: Chase is a great card to use. Higher limits and better rewards than all other credits cards I used in the past, I would recommend this chase card to everyone.

name: lorettadekoster
review: I went to Chase today to speak with a personal Banker about my account. Apparently they’re were busy at the moment and the woman did not offer to have me wait for a few minutes until one of them finished. What kind of customer service is that?

name: Justin
review: Easy to use, excellent rewards, and no hassles at all! I use this card for everything! I highly recommend Chase for all your credit card needs

name: Carmen
review: I spend money in this credit card for get the miles and putting the bills higth for nothing I only get 50,000 miles in 2 years and using the card for nothing, now I don’t used I yes pay.

name: Camille
review: By far, My favorite card.   The rewards are generous and they quickly rewarded my use and payment history with a credit increase.  The app is also the easiest you use and understand.  I like that you also get a pretty detailed weekly report.

name: Todd
review: It's a great card because you can use it for your Amazon purchases and you can also use it as a Visa card or pull cash out and get high rewards for purchases made on Amazon and other places.

name: Jon
review: Got a 3.85 rate with a 630 credit score on a 2020 Subaru Forrester. Got the car from Maita Subaru.  They were very helpful and only drew 2 credit reports to get me what I think was an excellent rate for my credit score

name: Daniel
review: No issues great access through my chase bank online access. They even gave me a credit limit increase without me asking. I don't like the fact that I can't request another increase online and have to call them though.

name: Darryl
review: Worst bank ever. They decided to close down both my checking and my credit card with no reason as to why other than, "we reserve the right to end our business relationship with you." They said the letter in the mail will explain why and it says the exact same thing. Have had the credit card for 8 months with no late payments other than the last month 1 day after they closed my account. Customer service is terrible. Chase used to be my favorite bank but after this sour taste I won't be banking with them in the future.

name: febaca505
review: We were at $9,500 credit limit and were at a little more than half way used once Christmas 2019 was over we paid off the credit card and they lowered our limit to $1,000. So very disappointed in this credit card as we go to both WDW and Disneyland at least once a year and use this to earn point that we then use on our trips. We also wanted to take advantage of the 6mnth 0% interest last year so we asked for an increase which was denied, which is so odd because our income is more now than it was 6-7 years ago when we got our card and our credit scores have been about the same. Anywho, I asked for an increase today because we are going to Disney World next month and all they could do was $1,000. This is so very disappointing! I am looking to just close this account and not even worry about taking the credit hit just to open one worth our time and money, mind you our other 4 credit cards have limits of $8,000+ and even last years around the same time I call Disney chase, we upgraded our Southwest chase. So I am not sure how one can do it and the other won’t. They are the same banks are they not?

name: John Sorrenti
review: It's great that they offer free checking for Veteran's. I also have a Savings account and a two year CD with them. They've always done right by me.

name: William Gibson
review: I've had the Chase Sapphire Reserve card for nearly a year now and I loved it, but I booked a hotel with my points and my flight changed so I needed to move the reservation one day. Chase told me there was nothing they could do and used my points for the initial reservation and then charged me again for the new reservation instead of just moving my reservation one day. Very disappointed in the experience and unfortunately will result in me no longer renewing my card.

name: Sally
review: It was a good card but high interest. Don't want another one. Customer service was very helpful when I had to call for any kind of assistance.

name: Cara Blake
review: I have had a Chase credit card for several years now and have been happy with their customer service until recently. In the last several months it has been extremely difficult to connect with an actual agent. The automated system is obnoxious and it takes me forever to reach someone, and once I do you can tell they are overseas and the connection tends to be poor. I was going to apply for another card with them but I think I will be looking at a different carrier at this point.

name: Kenneth
review: Great card with rewards. Chase has been my bank for over 20 years and it’s convenient to monitor my other accounts along with this one.

name: Kenneth
review: My experience with this card has been great! I love the rewards. Also, they are quick to update my balance to reflect payments with the credit reporting agencies.

name: Kenneth
review: One of things I like about this Chase card is that they update the paid balance on my credit report right away. Also, the rewards are awesome.

name: Eugene dave
review: wish there can be negative reviews available. and my account is a premium business account, and to solve a simple problem, i was put on hold and transferred 5 times with a total of 1 hour, and still waiting. I don't understand. its a very low efficient system. The customer service all have good attitude, but the system is just so broken.

name: Michael
review: Lowered my credit limit for no reason They lowered my limit on 2 chase cards Was never late never missed a payment And both cards are paid off They did it for no reason

name: Dorinda Ammons
review: I wish the rewards were automatic. I've missed some because I can't remember to turn them on or lose track of deadlines. Wish I could reduce interest rate.

name: Giuseppe
review: Great for cash back, especially if you use Amazon PRIME a lot (5% back; 3% without Prime subscription); 2% back at restaurants, drug stores, and gas stations. 1% for all other purchases. I don’t like the 1% back baseline. There are cards that do a flat 1.5% on all purchases. I use this with my Apple Card (which I can’t review on the site), to maximize my cash back. E.g., when I go to the supermarket, I use Apple Pay (with either my Apple Card or Amazon Card) to ensure I get 2% back at supermarkets. Just know what “type” of place you’re buying, and maximize cash back by using right mix of cards. There are some cards where you can choose a category to get 3% cash back (e.g., supermarkets). I’ve found the 5% back from Amazon to be terrific and using this card smartly with Apple Pay when needed to maximize cash back.

name: micang42
review: Open an account online, deposited a salary check online, printed information for direct deposit! Only to find out one week later account is closed with no reasons. Causing issues for me with getting a new check from my job! Customer Service Reps were not knowledgeable of how to answer my questions. This cause so much stress for me, because I had just undergone surgery and was unable to move around to get stuff straightened out! Really terrible experience with CHASE!

name: John
review: I have always been a fan of the product agent and services that they offer and I am glad I was able to get some productive use out of them

name: Dalvin
review: An awesome credit card for everyday use. I really recommend this credit card for those who want to earn a little more for different categories.

name: Richard
review: They started me off at 2300 moved account to $3300 limit. I am satisfied, I have other accounts totalling over $25000. I keep these paid off, or down low.

name: william
review: Great card to use and earn points, just takes them about two months to show if your card has a zero balance. I have paid it off more than once.

name: Ronald F
review: Provided a very competitive interest rate, website is easy to use, customer service is excellent,  made refinance process easy and quick.

name: Alirio
review: Muy buena tarjeta me gusta todo y me gusta el banco chase puedes alcanzar sus bonos sin necesidad de gastar demasiado y su portal en su aplicación es excelente

name: Kristin
review: Decent rewards. They paid out the $200 bonus pretty quickly once I spent $500, so that was nice. It's also interest free for 18 months but I always pay my balance in full but it would be nice in case something came up where I wasn't able to pay right away.

name: Jeremy
review: I switched to the unlimited card instead of the freedom flex with rotating categories, I like this one much better and you don’t have to activate anything.

name: Kerri
review: Reliable card, helpful customer service, great cash back percentages! Be sure to read the quarterly list of stores; for even higher rewards when you use your Chase VISA at places like grocery stores, pharmacies, gas, etc. (It updates every 3 months.)

name: Elias
review: Great card and bank Always have my self great customer service and great with myself by explaining to my self word for word on things I don't understand so I have a better way of understanding .

name: alikatz79
review: I have had this card for a few years now. I have been a good customer, on-time payments regular use of Credit Card. I had a bit of trouble this year with catching Covid-19 and having one medical bill go to collections. This card lowered my available credit and thus made an unpleasant situation much worse by lowering my credit they also caused other numbers to shift and thus a small issue is now a huge drop in my credit score. I will be paying off this card and closing the account and NEVER using CHASE again. If this is your idea of how to treat a loyal customer then I am sorry you FAIL!!!

name: steve_phillips0614
review: This account was paid in full approx 6 months early, we received title as shld have and sold vehicle soon after, we did not owe any money to bank. If we owed money they would have never sent time to us. This has been disputed and should be removed off of credit totally and in good standing.

name: Deanna Stanglewicz
review: The only reason it gets a 1 is because it wouldn't let me give a zero.  My 78 year old mother used her Chase Sapphire CC to make a purchase on the internet.  She purchased (or so she thought) a Nintendo Game Console for her grandson.  She received a plastic phone case instead.  When she disputed this with Chase and sent them all the information in the world proving it was fraud, Chase declined to help her and declined her a refund of the charges. We cancelled that card for her and got her a Capital One because they "have your back" in cases like this.  I too cancelled my Chase business and personal CC's and will never use that company for anything ever again.

name: Lazaro
review: I love it. No issues with this company. I’ve been with chase finance for a year and a half and to be honest I was late on a payment due to COVID when the pandemic first started they were very understanding and removed the late payment from my credit report.

name: Glen
review: Awesome travel card. Chase and Amex are the best banks to work with.... Full stop.  I thought about the sapphire reserve but I'm already a platinum card holder and with all the benefits that Amex provides on that card as well as travel and lounges being open again I thought that the sapphire preferred was the best way to go to avoid another absurd annual fee. Also I'm a freedom flex card holder so I can simply transfer my Chase ur points over to the sapphire preferred and get a nice bonus when I book travel. I have nothing negative to say about this card or my relationship with Chase Bank. Both are excellent

name: John
review: Great bank card. They are very easy to work with. I pay my card off every month and have had no problems with this company. I was born in 1947 and have lived a good life. I enjoy jerking people about stupid things. Don't know what I was thinking about when I was in the middle of the night and sleep well tonight and then I thought it was good

name: Bob Werner
review: They are definitely behind the times and this is why I don't deal with brick and mortar banks anymore.  After making a purchase, card was locked and I was told I had to go to a branch to get it verified.  I can't give my information over the phone or even send it to them.  Why bother having an App?!?I'm miles away from a branch and it's hard for me leave the house due to my handicap.  They need to find a better way.  I'm going to start banking with Ally Bank!  I've had a much much better experience with them and their rates are much better!!!  Also, their customer service isn't from overseas like Chase and much easier to deal with.

name: Norma C
review: Good card it gives you money back every time on rewards it reduces the minimum payment whenever you need to I can use it anywhere it never stops working for you.

name: cicisillmon
review: THE WORST BANK EVER. If you get a stipend, child support, or any checks above probably $300, DO NOT BANK WITH CHASE. they closed my account after I deposited a check from school, after taking almost 3 weeks to clear it! If it wasn’t for my income tax I wouldn’t have been able to pay my rent. I got an email saying my account was restricted so I called them and that’s when they told me my check amount was too much so they want to make sure it’s not fraudulent. Mind you I just opened this chase account so of course this is the first time I’m depositing my check from school. AN ACCREDITED UNIVERSITY AND INSTITUTION. How is that fraudulent?? Now I have to call and probably go to a branch tomorrow for them to tell me they’re going to mail me a check of my current balance... they do waaaay too much I can’t believe this.

name: Bob Werner
review: Same thing happened to me. They are the most inconvenient bank to deal with. That's why I switched to Ally bank.  No more Brick and Mortar banks for me.

name: evelina_daniellem
review: This card allows for specials.  Sometimes when checking into a hotel we get free room upgrades. We try to choose Marriott properties as often as possible.

name: Amelia Moya
review: Best card ever cause they give you everything in detail ! Thank you Chase I love all my credit cards I need one more I don’t know which one I should get

name: twu32
review: Chase credit card has stolen over $1000 from me. British Airways has refunded me that money back to my Chase credit card, and it’s been over eight months, but Chase Bank has kept that money from me. This was a refund that was given back to me for a canceled flight due to COVID.

name: Fernando
review: It’s a great card with great rewards. It's my main card with a great interest rate. It never lets me down. I highly recommended to anyone.

name: Bernard
review: They do not have competitive rates, even for people with a high credit score(789). You are better off getting a loan elsewhere. I did and saved a bundle

name: maria_tabachnikova
review: I was trying to dispute a transaction that was charged from my credit card. First time in the last 11 years being Chase's customer. My service provider charged the wrong card and when I figured that out they couldn't make the return. I called Chase and they advised me to pay with the other card that I wanted to be charged and then dispute the transaction that was done initially with Chase. I spent hours and hours on the phone with Chase dispute department. Every day they gave me controversial instructions how to proceed. I followed them all, sent them multiple documents via mail and email. They couldn't see delivered documents in the file (even when USPS tracking was showing my mails as delivered to their PO Box), they were complaining the prints were too light (printed on my brand new cartridge), they were saying they can not access the inbox of the email that they gave me themselves. And at the end they told me that still couldnt help me because it was too late now. I paid for the same service twice already because that's what Chase representative told me to do as the very first thing. The support that I've got was so far below satisfactory level! Very disappointing and stunning! I sent mail to their executive office, will see if at that level they have at least more knowledgeable and respectful people.

name: Jimmy Reyez
review: If I could give Chase mortgage negative star, I would. If you're looking to refi or new home loan, all I can tell you is I hope you have better luck then I did.  I have perfect credit, wanted to a shorter term loan, with 150k I'm equity. One would think this would be an easy loan process.  Well that was not the case.  Three months in and a lost appraisal fee later I gave up and used Rocket Mortgage.  Rocket Mortgage closed  was within 1 month of applying.  The biggest problem I had is lack of follow up which ultimate lead to prolonged application process. After three months and numerous complaints later, I gave up.  If you want to save frustration on refi loan process, chase mortgage may not be the best option. I'm done with chase in general.  I hope it helps someone not fall into the same trap I did.

name: Jerry Scott
review: I like this program. It suits my spending habits for getting the optimal cash back rewards. It changes every quarter too. I like JPM.

name: mia
review: So far I'm really loving my card it has great incentives and this is a card I will use and have for a very long time to make my Amazon online purchases and store purchases as well ..

name: Michal Kaminski
review: Terrible company to deal with. Our flight was canceled due to the COVID pandemic. We spilled our travel ticket expenses between two companies American Express and Chase(a mistake on our end, first and last). American Express refund money for our international flight right away. Then we asked Chase to do the same to refund the domestic flight. After 6 months and multiple appeals, we are out of $600. Chase refused to return money even after reporting to BBB. Never order anything using Chase bank unless you will not get the product and your money back.

name: Janet Gehl
review: I have never had a late payment.  I accidentally made a payment with the wrong checking account and immediately corrected the problem.  They have my payment and are not releasing use of the card for 10 days.  Meanwhile , my autopays are declined and I am dealing with late fees. THEY HAVE MY PAYMENT.   Unreal.

name: Michael
review: Chase has always been good to me and I have several cards, checking and car through Chase. Makes it easy to manage all in one place.

name: Tonya
review: Chase Southwest we had a $19,600 limit and they dropped it down to 500 for no reason we will be canceling the card $500 in a $69 annual fee is a joke

name: Chris
review: I’m so grateful for Chase their customer service spoil me wonderfully ? as I do numerous business transactions— And I love how they’ve designed their credit cards and their bank branches with all that beautiful sapphire blue tres  ? !!

name: Jerry
review: Didn't know I would be paying a monthly charge, it sucks. Thinking about closing it when I pay it off. Thought it was just an Amazon card. Amazon has no monthly fee, and free shipping when I use my wife's.

name: Sandra
review: Chase has help me when I most needed it.  Use it everywhere with no problems even when I've traveled. I'm happy to have  Chasecard

name: Nicole
review: Wonderful card with amazing benefits. Very easy to use .I love the app, which makes it really easy to see your balance and where you can make better financial decisions. The points balance is also easily accessible via the app.

name: Susan
review: Easy to get when we really needed a new car. No long wait, and given excellent interest rate with deferred start of payments. Also allow extra payment toward primary instead of interest.

name: Susan
review: Excellent customer customer, quick response to false charges. I’m very glad to have this card and hope to keep it open for a very long time. Perfect for rebuilding credit and for unexpected emergencies. This is one of my favorite cards!

name: Ana G
review: Dude! I have had chase since they bought out Washington mutual, that’s 12 yrs. I have never had a bad experience UNTIL THE PANDEMIC! The customer service is so bad! Have associates on the phone lying, transferring me,  not following with disputes, not keeping in contact with on going claims, associates just have been unprofessional. Idk if it’s cause they’re working at home! But def closing my account tomorrow. I know my account is going to hit them hard! DO NOT BANK WITH CHASE!

name: Peter
review: Well i sat with no credit and my wonderful sister and hubby added me as an authorized user and it is helping my credit score go up and up

name: lyubov
review: ;) I have had no problem so far with this card and bank.Good customer service and accessibility. Notifications on time and clear enough.

name: Kirk
review: The lack of an annual fee makes it useful to have in the wallet. That said, I do not recommend carrying balances on credit cards ever. It should be a measure of last resort. I keep the card because I have had it for over 25 years but have moved to a card that pays cash back

name: Kirk
review: I applied for this card through Amazon. On my online portal it says I earn 5% Back on Amazon.com and Whole Foods Market purchases with an eligible Prime membership. Which I pay I think $12.99 a month for the Amazon Prime Membership, I wonder if it’s worth it? An online review of the card says 3% back on Amazon.com purchases and Whole Foods Market. It could be that I earn 5% because I pay the monthly $12.99 prime membership fee, don’t really know what I earn. Rather confusing! The whole point thing is a confusing gimmick to me. I think they do that so the point number looks impressive! I only use the card for amazon purchases, also we don’t have Whole Foods anywhere around here so that’s no value to me.

name: Jeff
review: I love my freedom card and the rewards and benefits you get from it but don’t like how my credit limit decreased after I paid off my whole bill..

name: Lazarus
review: I was pleased. Thanks for helping me, I will be happy using you again. I would love to be able to get a loan and a car delivered. Thanks

name: Pamela
review: Excellent credit card! Very easy to use and monitor.  I would recommend it to others.  I am able to manage it quite easily.  Great service.

name: Kathleen
review: Rate is not great so I try to use it as little as I possibly can.  On the positive side the does have some rewards I rate it as okay.

name: Richard
review: happy with the card

name: Hardik
review: IT TAKES MONTHS TO REPORT THE PAYMENT but when there is a balance it reports well before time which is stupid and will not use in future

name: Ed
review: So far the cash back rewards seem better than Discover card. I like both cards and plan to continue using both but if I had to choose it would be the card with better rewards for sure.

name: Kathleen
review: interest rate is on the high side and rewards are not bad.   Normally I pay in full monthly but occasionally run up a balance with a major purchase. I pay it down as quickly as possible.

name: Julie
review: Good card to carry, just not as crazy about points rewards as cash back.   It’s good if you buy online for bigger discounts.   This card does offer specials all the time.

name: Marisol A
review: Got a pre selected offer letter in the mail for this card with bonus of $80k offer. I applied, with my 830+ score I got approved for $12,800 limit. I have to say I am not impressed with customer service from day one. Since I plan to make a big purchase within a couple days I had requested rush for the card so I can earn the bonus fast. 1. I called. I have no 16digit card number yet so I had to keep choosing different options before I got to a live person. 2. First person I spoke with transferred me to signature visa and signature visa said oh chase customer service should be the one to help with that cuz it’s their card. 3. Called again, and again since I have no card yet I have no 16 digit number yet so had to go thru all that hassle before getting live person. 4. Second person said ok u shall receive your card within a day or two via UPS. 5. I had to reach out again cuz I forgot to ask for tracking number. Third person said card was sent via USPS and u shall receive within 10 days. I said I was told it was expedited for me, then 4th person said yes it was sent rush and u shall receive within 2 days via UPS but there’s no tracking. Go figured I did not receive it yet. And on top of that, right after the inquiry my score went down 21 points! My luck! No late payment and my utilization overall is 1%. Card not even reported as open yet. How could an inquiry ding your credit so much? I was expecting only 2 points decrease or maybe 5 points. I’m giving it 3 stars for now for the generosity of bonus points and the flexibility of the card that you can use for travel or cash back. But if I was to rate it by customer service alone then it’s 1 star. They’re not consistent with their words. The 1800 number automated thing need major improvement as well.

name: Randall
review: Great experience with this card, enjoying the extra rewards. I use for gift cards and buy Christmas gifts for the entire family. Easy to decipher statements.

name: Shannon
review: Only use minimally right now. Want to lengthen my credit history before I begin using this card regularly. Chase has been extremely helpful with establishing habits necessary for maintaining an excellent credit rating at any income level.

name: atl0707
review: I've had this card for two years, and I will say that this is a decent card given the anniversary bonus of 3,000 pts, which AA and DL do not give out.  They also run specials over the holidays to get you extra points for grocery shopping, etc.  However, most of the time they do not give any extra points for grocery shopping, dining, travel (beyond travel on Southwest), etc. as other cards do, so I will often use a different card for dining out to get more points.  If I were to do it again, I would get a RR Premier card instead.  For only $30 extra, you get 3,000 extra points on your anniversary date, and there are no foreign transaction fees.  I may request a product change on this one to get those benefits, but otherwise, my Southwest card is my go-to credit card.

name: Emmanuel
review: It’s excellent. I keep it current at all times. I thank the financial analysis for all the good counsel. Thanks again for helping me focus.

name: Russell
review: The card and app is easy to use as a Chase customer. The rewards are fantastic for a credit card that is free to keep. For those reasons I highly recommend it.

name: Aashish
review: Timely extra rewards categories  is what I like the most...moreover the introductory offer was amazing. And after that redeemable options are great

name: Desiree
review: Excellent bank to do business with! I would highly recommend them to everyone! Never had any issues!!!

name: Christopher
review: Good experience so far. Applying for this one alerted me to an issue with a hold I’d put on my credit due to an identity theft issue from 5 years ago that I hadn’t closed out. Chase was very helpful in getting it resolved and got me approved with an outstanding limit. Have had no issues with the hold since getting approved for this card

name: Paul
review: The interest is way too high. Never been late but have a hard time getting interest rate lowered. They have no problem raising the credit limit  but can never

name: Christine
review: Love the Amazon points! I don’t know what else to say so I’m just typing. I don’t understand why there is a minimum of words to type to finish this.

name: Jill
review: 100% Highly RECOMMENDED 100 SATISFACTORY!!!

name: johnd_474
review: Great card. Love them and customer service is great as well I would recommend this card to anyone. Especially if you are an amazon shopper like myself.

name: Vicky
review: I had this credit card since college over 18 plus years but due to unexpected job reorganization, I was unable to make full payments but half of payment. I reached out before late payment to ask if Chase would work with me but they declined due to company policies. I was working eliminating this debt but they had no care. I now see this company differently and will bank differently with them from now on.

name: fochler
review: I have fraud purchases on my card and they refuse to remove them even after a police report! If I could give a minus, I would!! I have been a cardholder for 20 years and this is how they treat you. Don't get a chase card!

name: rh940
review: Chase Sapphire Preferred sounds good at the outset, but has wretchedly inefficient Customer Service. Plan to spend hours on the phone if you ever need to modify or rebook a flight. Time is money, and there is a losing tradeoff between the value of points, and the time one spends seeking to redeem them.

name: William
review: Great customer service. I'm always able to get representatives who are caring, empathetic, and understanding. Especially whenever any disputed charge appears.

name: Paul
review: The interest rate is way way too high. There is no reason it should be above ten percent. But hey they like robbing people. Don't waste your time.

name: Linda
review: Thanks for making it convenient to communicate and to do things through the app. Customer care is always to help in any way Again thanks

name: fastokie22
review: I'd give chase 5 stars, but as they were my mortgage holder that dumped me off to the evil, untrustworthy, underhanded, crooked, money hungry shark they call Carrington mortgage services, I had to knock the credit card down one star.

name: Toni
review: I have always paid my credit in full every month and always on time for 5 years and all of a sudden they decide to decrease my credit Limits without my knowledge and for no good reason. The rewards is poor quality. I don’t recommend Chase credit card. Also we spend so much and barley getting any of the reward s they promote.

name: joel_dupont
review: Stay away from chase, I never seen such incompetent bank in my history. I had one return payment due to a mistake on my side and even I made a big payment, they closed my account without any warning. When I called them they simply said nothing was possible after 10 years with them. I never encountered such of situation in my credit history, just stay away from such incompetent bank.

name: Domingo
review: I love the way JP Morgan handles this loan any money extra goes automatically to the principal, not like the thieves at Toyota financial

name: Nakisha
review: This was my grandfather's account. He passed away and they are still charging the account with late fees! I’ve worked so hard on my credit!

name: Brittany Thompson
review: Received a letter in the mail that stated I was a repetitional risk to Chase, they just gave me a $4,000 credit bump and then closed my account. I called the customer service number and they could not tell me why. I have had this account for nearly a decade with a $7,000 limit. Save yourself from the aggravation and save your credit score.

name: alikatz79
review: I just had the exact experience and they are like "oh, well perhaps you should be more responsible". So this is a boycott company for sure!

name: Nelson
review: The rate could be more competitive being that fed funds are literally 0%.  So my guess is that no matter what , the consumer is the one that has to commit to those big fat  commission checks that chase top gunners receive each year. I dont mind their checks, but i do mind my end cost.

name: Steven
review: Super quick to roll back credit limits while you have a balance higher than the reduced amount. Creating an "over limit" report to the credit bureau. I'm deployed, I don't always get direct mail or an opportunity to contest by phone. Very frustrating.

name: Sean
review: Amazing card.  Will definitely recommend it for you guys rates are low gives a high limit as well.  And helps a lot with customers services as well

name: Michael
review: Good benefits.   Great company.   Have given a increase in a short amount of time.  I enjoy the cash back offers on the bonus merchants.

name: whuser67014786
review: This is one of my favorites! I primarily use it for amazon, this is where the 5% cash back comes from! It's an Amazon Prime Visa but can be used anywhere. Anywhere else can vary from 3%-1.5% cash back.

name: Edna
review: Not happy with card this card at all do not wish to have this listed on my credit anymore I don't have the card. Not happy with it

name: Angela
review: Good card for travel, some really good perks, overall I’m a satisfied card holder. The annual fee won’t break the bank either. I’d definitely recommend.

name: John
review: Is a car loan i Services this loan early. I’ve been paying this loan off ahead of schedule.This product serves a  practical purpose.

name: Jesse
review: Good very good, thank you,Very pleased and thankful for everyone.Extremely kind customer service,Extremely kind and gratious and understanding.

name: dalekaren_edwards
review: worst customer service I have ever had to deal with, incompetent, slow, inaccurate. never fixed issue after 3 months, finally closed account

name: Frederic
review: Subaru needs to change Banks.  Chase Customer Service is horrible.  May switch manufacturer brands when my lease is up to avoid using them again.

name: Larry N
review: Have not had any problems I am satisfied this far I close accounts that become problems so as long as they uphold their obligation I hope this will be a long relationship

name: bmorris222
review: Total joke of a company don't waste your time. You will get approved and then they will drag it out continually for months on end until you're frustrated and just quit. I carried an 821 credit score applied for the refi, Got approved 6 months after it started it still wasn't finalized and I withdrew my application. Terrible customer service. My existing loan was with them , and had been for 5 years. I'm a NEW CONSTRUCTION contractor and talk with HUNDREDS of clients a year. I tell them ALL my experiences. Makes me feel better knowing I'm warning people and therefore keeping at least some from doing business with CHASE.

name: faith
review: I appreciate the rewards for purchasing certain goods and services. I plan on using them in the future. I have had no issues with this card.

name: m_l_henson7173
review: I would give this company zero stars if it was an option. I started a refi with the same company that I already have. I started this process in November. The company has told me around 20 times for an"award letter". This document does not exist. I have told them it does not exist I use the comments on the "conditional approval. I don't believe anyone reins November. .

name: steven malone
review: The card is versatile, can be used for all your needs, the cash advance should be raised to help the consumer in case of harsher times...

name: Elizabeth
review: The account had $30k credit limit and no balance Over $3000. No late payment. A credit repair program removed this good info. Why?

name: Mary
review: Great Jeep.  It’s old but runs well with very low mileage.  Chase has been great on our car loan.  No complaints with them at all. The Jeep has gone through the snow and the snow mountains without any problem.

name: Kenneth
review: APR is entirely too high even after 750 score.I refuse to keep paying that rate the fees are too high, so I paid it down and refuse to use..

name: Angie
review: Locked this card! They didn't early payment as a Feb payment, charged me a late fee for  not making a 2nd payment within a couple days of due date! Also, I'm  currently checking what caused super high balance suddenly!

name: Randy
review: I get really great service and positive help every time. And this card is helping my credit build up. And my shopping experience is seamless

name: darren
review: The card is entry level rewards however they do have some good perks with the card, when you spend at certain places that they sponsor.

name: Jamie
review: Great customer service. Been with them for 20+ years. Would definitely recommend as I have numerous times. Whenever I have an issue question or concern which has not been very many times especially for the length of time I have been with them it has been resolved or taken care of in a very timely matter.

name: Luk Wyns
review: I have a chase united airmiles card for over 10 years. Only reason I've stayed with chase was convenience. 3 major problems: 1. They're slow to post payments even though they go directly from my bank - the bank shows debits that can take a week to be recognized by chase. 2. Communication is terrible. Recently I had a major merchant dispute (>$2,000) and their customer service is hard to reach, unknowledgeable, and seem to leave no notes for their next colleague to take my next call. Worst of all, when it was resolved (in my favor) they never contacted me to notify me of that. 3. No customer service. If you can wait long enough to get through you will reach a rude unknowledgeable person who will likely drop that call transferring you. If you go online and post a message the only reply you get is to say that they're looking into it, that these things take time, and not to contact them again as it only delays them. their online messages are worded to infer that you're bothering them. Can't wait for Amazon/Jeff Bezos to open a bank and show how it should be done. I would not recommend chase to friends or family members.

name: Samuel
review: Good user interface. Good credit monitoring tool (one of the few which pull from Experian). Flexible rewards with competitive multipliers. Works in tandem with other Chase products. Excellent sign-up bonus.

name: briancrittenden49
review: After having my Chase Freedom account open since 2015, no missed payments, a 721 credit score and overall 16 years of perfect payment history on my credit report and with zero derogatory remarks on my credit bureaus. the Chase Freedom company reduced my credit line substantially. Then I received a notice in the mail that my interest rate is being changed to 29.99%. This is not "Freedom" it is more like "Slavery". I realize that my commentary in the long run will not affect the Chase Bank whatsoever, but to the best of my ability I will NEVER do business with Chase Bank again.

name: arin_pounov
review: The worst website platform for credit cards and bank account equally. There is no place to see an ongoing balance, how is that even possible?! Not on statements, not on the website. And for someone who makes hundreds of transactions each billing cycle, figuring out what the balance was at the time of each transaction or each payment is an impossible task. You would think you should be able to see a breakdown under account activities that looks something like this - 1/1/21 Amazon.com $100.00; 1/1/21 current balance $1,100.00. All of my other banks and credit cards have this option available, Chase decided they want to make your bookkeeping life a misery. I even called customer service to see if there's something I'm missing, I was told that the only way to do that is MANUALLY - as in sit there with a calculator and add and subtract your transactions. Is this 1980??

name: Angela
review: I like this card but I wish the interest rate was as low as my discover card at 11-15%.  I wish all my cards rates were this low with the cash back being matched at the end of the year

name: Kim
review: I have Chase cards for many years and I have only positive fillings. But you have to follow some conditions: PAY ON TIME AND IN FULL!

name: Karlo
review: Credit line decreased without any notice, after making a substantial amount. There's no explanation when speaking with representatives with creditor.

name: Christopher S
review: Don’t do business with Chase as they take actions that hurt your credit score.  I’ve had 2 cards with Chase.  The first was canceled by them without notice for inactivity because I didn’t use the card enough even though I always paid my balance in full and had near perfect credit.  I lost tens of thousands of dollars of credit and approximately 10 years of credit history on that line, which hurt my near perfect credit score.  Now they actually called (an improvement), but only to tell me they were cutting my credit line to my existing balance because I had utilized too much even though I explained the balance was being paid in full and I’d never missed a payment.  Again, I will take a credit hit because of the loss of unused credit.   I would NOT do business with this company.  You lose if you use the credit and lose if you don’t - and they obviously don’t care about the negative impact to their customers if you don’t fit their profit making profile.

name: Victoria AS Kirksey
review: There are not that many cash back rewards that I actually use but this is a pretty good card and no problems as of yet, just wish the limit was higher.

name: George
review: Account closed by chase bank without notice or reason.. little or no balance, never late...Horrible bank to do business with......

name: jose
review: Most of what is reported we already know, so it is good to have confirmation.  We have aleady taken action to rectify the issues mentioned.

name: Geraldine Tobia
review: Don't get this card! You can only pay your bill using your checking account!! This is very hard for people that have their income like disability that is put on a debit card.. I cant even make a payment without transferring my funds  Really Inconvenient!!! Poor customer service!!

name: Shana
review: Would not recommend this credit card, they are only there for themselves and not for their customers.  Not helpful and when it comes to credit reporting are not accurate.

name: Chad Pepe
review: Zero stars!! These crooks just cost me 100$ in late fees from my landlord. I went and deposited over 900$ today at one of my local branches atm. The atm took my money and did NOT credit my account the funds I deposited. I was given a receipt with the chase phone number on it and told to call to make sure my deposit went through. when I called I was told there was nothing they could do and I would have to wait up to 10 business days for funds to show up. Once it does. I will be closing my account. CROOKS!!!!

name: Juan
review: love chase! they worked with me. i will surely apply again. they have the best plans and the most helpful people working for them.

name: Ebbra
review: No problems with this service, Great with returns though Amazon.  Good customer service, always there to help. I would recommend this card service

name: william phan
review: if i could give 0 star i will do it. terrible mortgage service. setup a big trap for customer to step in the trap step by step. after i paid 500$ to review document for refinance and keep giving hard time..they never told you what to do at the first time.  american save already approved my document but my wife told me just close that and go with bank. and that is a stupid idea i has listen to her. first and last time deal mortgage with Chase,

name: Bill Graham
review: Chase has horrible customer service. They locked my card and I had to call their Security Dept. I was using my cell and they told me my number wasn’t recognized, they asked me some security questions and I answered them but I was then told my answers were incorrect. I called on my home phone when I arrived home from work and immediately Closed my account that I had had for over 10 years!

name: gariscontractingelectric
review: Worst bank I have ever dealt with. They are crooks who prey on the weak!! I was told they could not offer me no help after paying payments on time for over two years!! After Losing a spouse and dealing with loss of work due to covid . Then being in the hospital and having three children means nothing to these people. They won’t be getting a penny from me ever again!! At this point let them send it to Collections!! Don’t care anymore! They will be added to the list of lawsuits that I will be coming after!! You can’t have your work shut down by the government and these companies demand payment! Also for the customer service side the individuals have a lack of empathy towards someone who is in crisis and just lost their spouse! They are cold individuals and should lose their jobs!!

name: Josefina
review: I really like this credit card is a Good services and rewards credit card for people that likes to shop at Amazon and also is a good rewards on gas

name: Emman C
review: I used chase credit card and points purchased an airline ticket on their travel website for 12/19/2020 traveling. Ended up I couldn’t travel due to positive COVID-19. No one emailed or follow up with me for refund after I submitted the lab results on 12/16/2020. I called today and they said they used Expedia to purchase ticket for me so Expedia refused refund and Chase will not reimburse the points I used. Chase told me to contact Expedia but not giving me any necessary information to call. Chase also refused to email me for our conversation and instructions how to get travel voucher. Yes Chase sucks and not reliable. Do you use their banking, what’s a scam!

name: Ferdinand
review: It was an average experience. The interest rate was very high so that is why I choose a consolidated loan to pay off my credit cards

name: Mark Aliyan
review: One of the worst, most disrespectful, and most disgusting banks out there. I decide to pay off my full “Chase Freedom Unlimited” balance of $5,200 recently, to save on interest, boost my credit score, and to still have my credit line available in the case of emergency, in the middle of this pandemic. Literally the day after, Chase decreased my credit line from $5,700 to $500!! Out of nowhere and without any notices! Oh and right after paying off my full balance!! I called Chase multiple times to try to convince them to reverse their unbelievable decision, or to at least reverse my payment and refund it, but nothing worked, and now I’m suffering from a horrible financial difficulty, with not having one of my biggest and oldest credit line available, all thanks to Chase, one of the worst banks in the United States.

name: Lynsey
review: We purchase a lot of our items on Amazon and we utilize the subscribe and save option so it is nice to be able to get points for things we already buy.

name: holisticmagician
review: I was attacked by a hacker in August. The first thing I did was secure all my accounts, then alert my bank and credit card companies. He didn't get access to anything, but the attempts basically made me, "associated" with a known criminal...yeah, in the same way a victim is, "associated" with their rapist...anyway, Cap One closed my bank account without notice, which made me miss ONE credit cards payment with Chase (we got it sorted out after a few days). So then a couple weeks later they shut that card down...kay...supervisors couldn't care less but it didn't hurt my credit too terribly. Well, just today I logged in and saw they closed my OTHER credit card account, which now completely messes up my debt to income ratio to the point that my credit is destroyed enough that declaring bankruptcy isn't much worse, so I'm going to do that because at this point I'm not paying these people a dime. The hacker wasn't even successful-his attack was MUCH LESS damaging than these companies I have had a relationship with for years. Hell, I just opened a new business account with them a week ago. AVOID CHASE- a year into a pandemic they ruined my life and won't even tell me why. When I asked for the reason the second account was closed they said, "there's no reason listed...UMMMMM

name: Mohamed
review: One of the best credit cards I have ever used. Accepted everywhere, great rewards, and payments are reflected on my credit history in 24-48 hours.

name: Gregory
review: Great card, I get cash back, no fees, and reports on time. Great card for building strong credit scores. I use the rewards to simply pay down my own balance.  Win-win.

name: Stephen Martin
review: The theft of my points by chase travel service is outrageous. They blame third party airlines for their own mistakes and leave the customer with no recourse. If you plan to use this credit card to travel, you will be disappointed. Better to book a flight directly with the airline itself...cheaper and more secure in the long run.

name: owen
review: Good little card! I opened checking account with chase and then applied for the card shortly afterwards. I'm not sure this affected approval odds, but maybe

name: Cliff
review: Credit process was seamless. How can you complain about anything when your interest rate is 0%. Awesome. Paperwork was easy to complete and you have a large company that works with you.

name: Myles
review: Great all around no-annual fee card! Great intro offer, high points return on useful categories, and nice benefits. The 5x on groceries alone is worth the inquiry.

name: Virginia
review: Southwest points are awesome!  Easy to use.  Wish annual fee was lower.  Simple-direct-rewarding to use.  Online platform used to be problematic but now nes & simplified.

name: Numan
review: Excellent credit card, works perfectly most times, and provides valuable points in return. The card faces no issues during international travel too.

name: Amy F
review: Please take a look at your Chase Credit Card changes. They are raising all their rates quite a bit right smack dab in the middle of a Pandemic where millions of people are having a hard time paying for things and even putting food on the table. How awful. If you reject the changes, which you have a right to do they will close your account! For shame Chase, for shame!  The changes take effect right when your taxes are due! 4/8/21. Card holder beware!

name: Carolina P
review: The worst nightmare customer service. Money disappears intentionally? How to trust a financial institution when your money disappears and no answer's given to the customer and when they see the problem no one fixes it right away.

name: Judi Harris
review: I had the chase business ink card. There was a FRAUDULENT charge for hotels of approximately $3,000. Chase did NOTHING to correct the fraudulent charges. They were of absolutely zero help and allowed the charge to remain on my card until I paid for it.  Beware of chase credit card services! They totally dropped the ball. Find another credit card.

name: Elmira Rzayeva
review: The worst bank ever! Avoid them at all costs! I had a checking account with them and they closed it with no explanation and told me they would send my money in a month but it has been 9 months and they still haven't given my money.They have stolen my money! They are thieves!

name: Tonya
review: It stinks can’t transfer it and can pay it down. Soon enough. I wish I would have never got it but at the time I needed credit I was going through a terrible divorce and my ex had emptied our bank account my kids needed to be fed and bills had to be paid.

name: Pablo
review: After 6 months of on-time payments and paying my card off every single month, I expected chase to auto increase my credit limit. Unfortunately, they did not and want me to request a credit limit increase that would result in a hard pull. If I weren't in the process of buying a home, I would have happily pursued this option. Despite that, I was surprised when chase sent me the offer to apply when my credit average score was 640.

name: Anthony
review: If you shop on Amazon you must have this card. Five percent cash back on all Amazon purchases. What's not to like about that!!!!!!

name: Melissa Sanchez
review: I have been with Chase for over a decade. I made a huge payment on 1/21 to put my balance utilization under 30%. On 1/23 my credit balance was significantly dropped putting me at 100% utilization which will hurt my credit. I called and asked why and they said I had too many inquiries showing on Experian soft pull. I have 100% payment history with them and no late payments and requested them to bump it back up, they said not without a hard pull...I allowed a hard pull, they still said they are unable to offer the same credit as before. Poor business practice. People remember this when the economy is back to normal lending practices and who you want to do business with.

name: hbterry
review: Chase is a monopoly and needs to be broken up into small pieces to spread the wealth and give consumers more choices! Saving acct rates are nil.  We were getting close to 5% in interest rates till Chase gobbled up WAMU in a scam of a deal for pennies on the dollar.  Where to save money? Put it in the market and hope it goes up?  How come our government doesn't back consumer savings accounts with a descent rate of return so we can all have some security in times of need? Shame on Wall street and Uncle Sam!

name: Nicole
review: I love Chase I have never had a problem with them and anytime I need help they are always on top of everything they also make sure you have the best card suitable for you

name: anniekatinabrown
review: I have had Chase for 7 years.. Never had any problems.. Always paid my bill on time and paid them off.. All of a sudden they lower my credit.. Causing my credit score to drop... as I got closer to the 30% utilization they decreased my credit.. I will be closing out all three accounts and NEVER dealing with them again.. Stay away from CHASE bad business

name: Melissa Sanchez
review: This just happened to me! I made a huge payment to drop my utilization to 30% on 1/21 and on 1/23 and they decreased my credit. I called to let them know that in 6 years have never missed a payment nor have been late. They said there is nothing they can do and gave me a bunch of garbage that there were too many inquiries on my credit. I will also be paying this card off and never using it again nor doing business with Chase.

name: eadkins019
review: I absolutely cannot stand this bank, customer service is terrible, the mobile isn't too great, locations suck! Not convenient at all, I got locked out because I opened a savings account online like really? I opened my checking online with no problem. The only thing good is the debit card designs hahaha really. I would NOT recommend this crappy bank.

name: Keith
review: It was good while I had it. The bonus includes baggage allowance and one annual pass to VIP room. Annual fee was the main drawback.

name: mzkeez05
review: I put in my state check which is for large amount and they put a 7-Day hold on it which has never been done before when he found out I was black the supervisor said I believe it won't clear. mind you I've been banking with Chase for over 30 years have never put in a fraudulent check so what made him say that I do not understand so I called to report it and now this person won't even give me a supervisor she puts me on hold hoping I hung up this is how the service I really believed everyone of color should close their accounts with this Bank that would teach them a lesson for being so racist

name: Theresa Imse
review: I have been with Chase since 1975. I remember the days when my interest rate was 5.99% since I have impeccable credit,but then as everything else that interest rate rose. I still stuck with Chase because they are a very loyal bank, and fair to do business with.

name: Rene Heuscher
review: One star, not trustworthy, poor communications, no service and not following state law. Went to withdrawal money from my branch for a RE transaction. My +$25K was gone. Local branch did not have information, said to call 800 number. Callcenter said they sent it off to state unclaimed property. No notification to me, no notification to branch and no due diligence letter as required by state. Now I have to file claim then wait 60 days. I live at same address 15 years, same phone number and email they have on file, it is not that I am hard to contact.

name: Stacia
review: It’s fine. I’m haven’t had any issues with this card or with Chase as a company. Would recommend if you’re trying to build your credit.

name: Charlotte Pardue
review: Dirty Business! I complained about false charges and they reviewed my account. My original conversation before sending out my new card with the gentleman was that my score..card and everything was fine. They lowered my limit without even so much as a letter or phone call. Do not sign up for this card! or any card. This is a prime example of too big for their own good..they are dirty! Choose another bank and another Credit Card Company to do business with!! I am not just bitter, I am honest!

name: Natalie
review: Chase has been very good, especially with Covid hitting people hard financially.  They offered a forbearance for several months and automatically added the payments to end of the loan.

name: Maroun
review: No complaint here. I need more thought it’s not enlightening!!!!!!!!!!!!! None offered any sort of COVID consultation. My credit should be much better now!

name: Pagan
review: Been with Chase for a long time. They look out for me and call if something doesn't look right. Very good service and easy to use website. I wish they would be more environmentally & socially active.

name: Faisal
review: It's a solid credit card but if you need customer support for any problems, concerns, or disputes you can expect to be told to "lock it up and deal with it".  The credit card services team is not the same as the banking one ( which is way better ).

name: pm041
review: I opened a checking account, also I have a car loan in chase. In couple months, by accident, I've overdrawn with a transfer to another bank, I put money back in couple of hours, as result they complete payment but charged me for 5% fee, it was the same day, I do not understand the logic of this fee - I didn't have this money even a day. Also, they do not do refinance for auto loan since pandemic. It's almost 1 year is gone and they still do not operate in normal mode, weird and slow. I cannot recommend that bank because of bad experience and comparing what customer service I have with others. I have multiple accounts in other countries as well and comparing all of them the worst one is chase, I really expected more from you guys. But online app is good one.

name: Patricia
review: it has helped me through hard times and a few Christmases. right now it is helping me with my new business  start up and then I will pay it back.

name: Kimberly
review: Awesome company! Great introductory APR rate and cash back is better than any I've seen! Their customer service is second to none!

name: CATHERINE
review: No issues using or paying on the card.  No fees.  Straightforward and Courteous service.  Is a decent as far as credit cards go. I like Chase Bank.

name: walmanphoto
review: Occasionaly I don't receive my mail and have to deal with vendors who are always understanding.  I have a very high credit rating and always pay in full.  Recently I didn't get my Chase statement for two months and left around four emails to Chase with no response.  I called Chase and spoke to a supervisor named Leo.  Leo said I would have to pay the penalties and was not interested in my explanation.    I will never ever use this company again and don't know why anyone would want to use them when there are so many other good credit card companies out there.  Upper management needs to speak to this Leo person.I just spoke to my wife and she tells me mail has been held up at our post office since October.

name: Celeste
review: Haven't had this card for very long, but I often order from Amazon and enjoy all of the perks that come with it. So far, Chase has been pretty good at reporting my payments on time.

name: Dianne
review: Linked to Amazon, I don't like bullies & I won't do business w/them so I cancelled the credit card & everything else I had at Amazon.

name: patricia
review: Chase is certainly my go-to card and the tracking system is great. I can easily track all my purchases and spending and best manage my monthly activities.

name: Peggy
review: Love this card, has a nice reward that I use to pay on my balance.  Easy to use and easy to use their website.  Also sends alerts text.

name: Margaret Cotherman
review: I had a claim for overcharging and they refused to accept supporting documents for my claim. The only digital way they will accept docs is through Secure Message Center that will not upload the documents. AND THERE IS NO TECHNICAL SUPPORT to fix the problem. So they just kept sending me to the thing that doesn't  work and refused to talk about fixing it. It is exactly like they disabled it on purpose so you could not send them anything. I had to go to Staples to fax the docs, because a branch was so far away. I have had repeated problems with customer service not listening to me, just giving me negative canned responses and refusing to help me.

name: William
review: Amazing card, from an amazing banking company. I love the many benefits of the card, its an amazing card for college students, gives benefits on food delivery, and lyft services.

name: Gregory
review: Loan process was fast and painless. Didn't have to provide an enormous amount of information. Subaru took care of the entire process.

name: Vlado Hruda
review: It sucks big time. The card never arrives on time. You cannot get in their online system, and then you are looking to submit a notice about stolen/not delivered credit card they ask you for a 3 digit verification number which is on the card itself, which you never seen in the first place. Well done Chase for messing up such an easy process and messing it up a big time!!! Stay away!!!

name: Tuan-H
review: Thanks Chase Home Loan AAA. We will Enjoy Our Home as long as we can.

name: annette
review: No problems with this card but I’m paying it off only not using to buy anything want out of debt!! I don’t have anything else to add.

name: Joshua
review: Great card with great benefits I would suggest anyone who uses credit cards to go with this one. They regularly increase the credit limit

name: Lori
review: I like this card because it gives me rewards back or towards Amazon purchases, which I make a lot of especially during this pandemic.

name: Marlon
review: Good card.  Great for everyday use and big ticket purchase use.  Works very well with Amazon, almost seamlessly.  Rate could be a lot lower... but monitored use helps.

name: Clarissa F
review: If you're thinking of banking with Chase bank I'd look elsewhere. I just paid off a a credit card in an effort to help my credit score and then had my limit slashed by the bank. When I called they had to make ANOTHER inquiry on my credit even though they just made this change yesterday and then refused to reinstate the limit that I've held for years. This is a slap in the face to a customer that has always maintained a good standing with credit and accounts, who has paid interest to this bank and who just paid a large sum of money to them that could have gone elsewhere. Very disappointed and I will be moving my banking elsewhere to a company I can trust and who actually gives a damn about their customers who are giving them business.

name: David
review: Nice 60,000 bonuses it's after spending $4000 in first three months. No transaction fee when traveling is a HUGE plus. Also, 2pts on any restaurant anywhere make this a go-to dining-out card. This is a traveler's card.

name: Kevin
review: Customer service gives you the run around, and poor and misleading info. Don't tell me there are job shortages when I have to wait 45 min to talk to a service rep.

name: Donald Wayne
review: A very useful card with plenty of perks. Online service is easy and user-friendly making it easy to pay or setup payment also their customer service reps are helpful.

name: Syed
review: I am chase customer for 10 years, I am very disappointed because since 10 years they are hardly increased my credit line. Even if I make good money and I have excellent credit score. When I called chase customer service they said if you want to increase your credit score chase bank will check your hard credit score, I think that’s unfair because I have chase bank app which is showing my credit score is excellent, other banks like Bank of America and city bank didn’t check any hard check In my opinion chase bank needs to improve and make easy things for customers.

name: Cindi G
review: I've had this credit card for quite a few years and really like it, I've never had a problem with anything about it!  Would definitely recommend.

name: Scherwin
review: I travel so I like the opportunity to earn points from dining, hotel stays, and airline travel.  The Interest rate could be lower.

name: MIRIAN
review: satisfied with this credit card that i’ve been utilizing.

name: Jeffrey
review: 2020-12-31 WalletHub Review Chase Freedom Unlimited My first card. 2011 opening date. Responsible for building a very influential credit history. That was needed for medical billing. My parents had paid its balance, for the most part. And, Chase was always willing to help in instances of dispute. So, if you're going to build your kids' credit history, plus have good standing with Chase, this is a decent option to choose from.

name: Kyle C
review: I've had the Chase Freedom Unlimited card for the last year or so and have had no issues with it overall to this point. Would recommend it.

name: Njifen D
review: This card has no balance due. I made all its payments since two year now. The card has a zero balance due at this particular moment. Chase card is not owing no balance.

name: Brian
review: Excellent credit card with an excellent line of credit and benefits. Easy to use, safe, logical website. I highly recommend Chase Freedom.

name: bld11381
review: Company lowered my balance by $2000 as soon as I paid $2000 on my account, no reason, no notice and I haven’t been late on payments don't pick this company.

name: Cynthia B
review: This chase slate may just be the only card left you can get that does not charge you a few to transfer money from another account into it. Get it while the getting is good

name: Lorenzo Jones II
review: Horrible communication from chase. Couldn't get a reply until after my close date. Got so bad, the seller's agent refused to even accept a loan even if Chase gave the go ahead. Do not trust their pre-approval, it will leave you with a hole in your wallet.

name: Daniel Villars
review: I would highly recommend folks considering switching credit card providers if intend to use Chase Travel services for booking a flight. I booked a flight through Chase Travel and my flight was cancelled two months prior to my departure. Chase Travel NEVER alerted me of the cancellation and NEVER alerted me that my new flight was leaving on a new date. When I called Chase Travel to inquire about this miscommunication and failure to notify, they offered no answer and made no amends. They told me "You're correct that we never notified you. We have no record of emailing, texting or calling you, despite the fact of your flight being cancelled months ago."  I understand that mistakes can happen, but I would've appreciated at least an apology or some attempt to rectify the situation.

name: Fredrick
review: I am extremely satisfied with my Chase Morgan savings and checking account. I am also very pleased with my Chase freedom Visa card. The personnel at Chase Morgan bank and credit card service have always been extremely helpful and Courteous with me. Fredrick H. Martinez

name: Arleen Obrien
review: Be careful with Chase and Zell I have been with them since 1996 I sent some funds to someone they never received it and when I looked into it further the phone number was transposed I thought because I contacted Chase within 24 hours they could reverse it they told me they had no control and I am out of $200 beware

name: Elijah
review: Trash , honestly, it was horrible and just no.

name: Sonji
review: I have had this card about 5 years. I really love this card. My experience has been very good. Customer service is excellent. Trying to get the Amazon card now.

name: Nava
review: With the cash-backs and the extra benefits easily recovers the annual fee within 3 months. I need often the car rental insurance and this only makes the card worth it

name: SHERYLANN
review: Great Service Great rewards I use this card for gym membership It serves its purpose.

name: Thorn
review: Great card. Especially with the addition of 5% travel and  3% restaurants plus unlimited 1.5%. Chase Ultimate rewards is one of the best cc reward programs.

name: Harry
review: Good card, interest a little high. Mostly good customer service. Great on annual/bi-annual special offer check transfer rates and terms

name: Paul
review: Great travel card with a small annual fee. Offers great perks in terms of transferring to other partners and having a lot of benefits for purchase protection and travel claims.

name: Paul
review: Great travel card with a small annual fee. Offers great perks in terms of transferring to other partners and having a lot of benefits for purchase protection and travel claims.

name: godwintimothy34
review: Ok , the money back is crap . If you have a say $10,000 balance.You make a $9,999 payment one month. You are still going to beCharged interest on the whole $10,000. My patient has one and i had to take over his finances ( i am not only his care giver , i had to get custody of him).After going through his cards he had a amazon chase card and i did research and thats what i found. This cash back is only a good deal if you pay your balance in full each and every month or you just dont spend anything on it., DO YOUR RESEARCH PEOPLE!!!!!

name: Robert
review: Just an average card. Open a checking account with Case and they’ll offer u this card Started with $1200 limit now have $6600. Credit score around 700 Now 760

name: Chandra
review: We have never had any issues with this auto loan. The phone app and pay by phone makes it super easy to stay on top of your payment and keep track of your balance.

name: Valerie
review: I love my chase credit card and rewards thank you also you get free credit report, always can look at your credit report definitely would refer people to get this card lots of cash back

name: Crystal
review: I have a 774 credit score according to wallethub and all my bills including mortgage are never late. Applied for this card & was denied. Very annoyed that WH recommended it & said approval odds were excellent cuz now I have a hard inquiry on my account.

name: James
review: Do you/did you have any kind of relationship with Chase at the time you applied?  I've watched a lot of videos about Chase and it seems that unless you have a relationship with them (some kind of bank acct. or loan, etc) it is quite a bit more difficult to obtain a card... I had credit in the mid-600's (except for my TransUnion which was higher), applied for a checking and savings account with Chase and, at the end of my application, a blue icon came up saying I was pre-approved for and received their card (Freedom Unlimited) - I was shocked!! Open some kind of account with them, then build up the relationship and apply again.

name: Pedro
review: Good credit card with an introductory bonus and rewards on purchases, the only bad thing about this card is that the minimum payment is quite high, otherwise it is very good.

name: Marjorie
review: used for weekly grocery shopping and all online purchases. appreciate the point value that I  then can spend on Amazon purchases. Point values can be used at my discretion

name: myrtus3
review: I used to really like Chase Bank, especially since we have been moving a lot. They have a solid online banking system and there's branches all over. Except this year, we have moved to a small town that doesn't have a Chase branch and suddenly we're having all kinds of issues that they want us to drive 4 hours one way to a location to fix. Customer service has gone down the tubes, they aren't friendly, they aren't helpful. I need a new card sent to me and they keep telling me I have to visit a branch to get a new card because of a "security issue" but they won't tell me what this security issue is or what type of "proof" I'm going to need at a branch to prove it's me when I get there. If I have to drive 4 hours I need to know this information up front! To top it off we called a branch like the customer support center suggested and they told us everything was fine and there was a new card on the way. Two weeks later there's no card and they're claiming they didn't send a new card and we have to go in. It's just going around in circles and no one will help at all. I can't wait to switch banks after we move in a few months.

name: Daryl
review: Chase account has been good restored money on my card on fraudulent charges almost immediately very good customer service. Would recommend chase accounts

name: Ephrem
review: This card is good , No international fee, fixed APR,  excellent for travel if you choose southwest Airlines,  double rapid reward point , multiple point & discounts for car rental and privileges for southwest flights.

name: Chris
review: Really a 3.5 but no choice for that. Would have received a 5 if not for the $99 annual and bonus points. Great card to have when travel costs are so low and you really get to take advantage of it with the miles. I put everything on it and they add up. I messed up and let the bonus points from the sign up promotion expire before spending enough to get them by just a few bucks and they DID NOT let me have them. Make sure you get them by the date deadline. For not hooking me up as a valued customer over a few $ is a bit petty, but I’m to blame ultimately. A $99 annual is kinda too IMO high so use it, don’t let it just sit in the wallet. I’m not using it for business. Maybe other perks for that. iDK. Get some miles back for paying to off set the high annual. They gave me a generous limit and I bank with chase so it makes that a plus too for app sync.

name: Lewis
review: Thanks ?! Great Card to have. Definitely need some rewards or more incentives. Chase is a good bank to use. Mobile banking is also great and statements are clear, and easy to read.

name: laracancila1994
review: Worst costumer service no help I’d decide to close my account with them completely they wouldn’t dispute a charge and force me to pay ridiculous amount of money they steal  don’t recommend this brand.

name: Rachelle
review: Was great when I needed it but felt I needed to upgrade to more of rewards card. So moved to capital one. And now looking at Amex.

name: muvmental
review: Absolute worst customer service ever. 10 minutes on the phone giving them every possible security answer because the web interface is unusable. We opened a dispute and they were horrible to work with. Took hours, then they required a signed document that they never mailed to us. They closed the dispute an wouldn't reopen it, caused by their error. They are awful.

name: Charles Coleman
review: Love the Freedom card. It's been real good to me for the points. Never used it for flights but have used it for rental cars and hotels. One of the better entry points cards. Consistently pay on time and you will get credit limit increases. The Slate card is OK. I'm happy with it. But I primarily use the Freedom card.

name: Nathan
review: The card has no issues, just a nice simple card with simple rewards. As you can tell I’m a simple person. As if I couldn’t make that any simpler

name: JANNENE
review: Earning mileage is fast and easy. No problems with customer service, can do everything on the app. Interest a bit high, but I usually pay before much is accumulated.

name: Kristen
review: This is an awesome card with easy to get rewards, good sign up bonus spend $500 in the first 3 months to get $200. Got my bonus already. This is my card for everyday spending since it has so many great perks and you earn rewards for food and restaurants X3. Prefect card couldn't be happier. Please know chase has a 24/5 rule. Where you can't get more than 5 cards in the last 24 months or you won't be approved. You can check pre approval on chases website. Always a good idea if you're not sure. This is by far my favorite CC I have. why not earn rewards for everyday spending? Great sign up bonus. Yes yes yes

name: darrells_21
review: Awesome card. I've used this card for several purchases and have been pleased. Customer service reps have been pleasant to work with. Need to increase Credit limit!

name: Ambreen
review: I love the offers I get from my chase card. I am extremely satisfied with their services and using these cards for the last 10 yrs

name: amyusher79
review: Received an offer to open a checking and savings. Spent an hour opening the account, then was promptly locked out of all online access including my previous Chase cc's. Spent 1.5 hours on the phone being transferred to 5 different people who had NO CLUE what was going on or essentially of their own names it seemed only to be told I should start again and open a new account. What a joke. Seriously, Chase? With all of your billions you can't do better?? Get it together. All you will get here is wasted time and a whole lot of apologies.

name: Paul Smith
review: I had a chase bank checking account for nearly 10 years, which was recently closed by chase bank for no reason, after I tried to transfer a small amount of money to another bank account. Chase bank has really gone downhill as they lack the competence to perform basic banking functions, such as a wire transfer or knowledge of legal banking practices. Chase bank declined my wire transfer several times for no reason and then locked my checking account with no explanation. When I called them, they told me they closed my account for no reason and then refused to provide me with 5 years worth of my transaction history documentation, which is required by law in order for a bank to be FDIC insured. Then they froze my account funds for 10 days before mailing me a check, which still hasn't arrived, which is also illegal. Chase bank will soon be the next Lehman Brothers, their incompetence will drive them to extinction. They were just sued and lost a 920 million dollar federal lawsuit due to their criminal activity. Go figure. I'm so glad I'm no longer associated with these criminals.

name: Douglas M Wyman Jr
review: It is to me the Best Credit Card On the Market. Great Cash Back Rewards along with many other benefits. I highly recommend The Chase Freedom Card!

name: Rickie
review: It doesn’t matter how good your credit is or how you pay on time .They never lower the interest rate.

name: Sara
review: Not much of a credit limit, but I pay this card every month.  Also, kind of high interest rate.  They also have a nice credit score feature

name: Jeff
review: Chase offers a good Interest rate for their customers. They also have a great staff of phone reps that will do their best to take care of their cardholders.

name: Kenneth
